Pekerjaan Pemeliharaan di Tol Jagorawi Ditargetkan Selesai Desember
03 Nov 2019, 14:34 by Rini Hairani


Pekerjaan Pemeliharaan di Tol Jagorawi Ditargetkan Selesai Desember

KBRN, Jakarta :  PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk Regional JabodetabekJabar melanjutkan kembali pekerjaan pemeliharaan jalan dengan rekonstruksi perkerasan di Ruas tol Jagorawi.Pada Minggu depan, dimulai dari hari Senin tanggal 4 November 2019 pukul 10.00 WIB s.d Kamis tanggal 7 November 2019 pukul 15.00 WIB, pekerjaan dilakukan pada Km 07+710 sd Km 07+810 dan Km 09+110 sd 09+210 di jalur A lajur 1. Setelah 7 minggu pelaksanaan pekerjaan, total pekerjaan rekonstruksi yang telah dilakukan sd saat ini adalah 1300 m, dari total 1.900 m sampai dengan akhir tahun 2019. Marketing and Communication Department Head, Irra Susiyanti mengatakan selama pekerjaan berlangsung, bahu jalan dapat digunakan sebagai jalur lalulintas, kecuali hanya pada pukul 22.00 s.d 06.00 WIB, akan ditutup untuk akses alat berat."Jasa Marga Regional JabodetabekJabar memohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang timbul akibat pemeliharaan jalan tersebut," kata Irra seperti rilis yang diterima RRI,  Minggu (03/11/2019).Menurut Irra,  untuk mengantisipasi penyempitan jalan yang terjadi akibat rekonstruksi, Regional JabodetabekJabar menyiapkan rekayasa lalu lintas berupa contraflow secara situasional, dengan titik awal Km 05+600 s.d Km 13+000 Jalan Tol Jagorawi, mulai pukul 15.00 s.d 21.00 WIB. "Diimbau kepada pengguna jalan agar tetap berhati-hati, memperhatikan rambu-rambu dan arahan petugas, serta mengatur waktu perjalanannya," tambah Irra.

Maintenance Work at Jagorawi Toll Road Is Targeted to be Completed in December
03 Nov 2019, 14:34 by Rini Hairani


Maintenance Work at Jagorawi Toll Road Is Targeted to be Completed in December

KBRN, Jakarta: PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk Regional JabodetabekJabar resumed road maintenance work with pavement reconstruction in the Jagorawi toll road. Next Sunday, starting on Monday 4 November 2019 at 10.00 WIB until Thursday 7 November 2019 at 15.00 WIB , work was carried out on Km 07 + 710 till Km 07 + 810 and Km 09 + 110 sd 09 + 210 in line A lane 1. After 7 weeks of work implementation, the total reconstruction work that has been carried out until now is 1300 m, out of a total of 1,900 m until the end of 2019. Marketing and Communication Department Head, Irra Susiyanti said that during the work, the shoulder of the road can be used as a traffic lane, except only at 22:00 to 06:00 WIB, will be closed for heavy equipment access. "Jasa Marga JabodetabekJabar requested sorry for the inconvenience caused by the maintenance of the road, "said Irra as released by RRI on Sunday (03/11/2019). According to I rra, to anticipate the narrowing of the road that occurred due to reconstruction, JabodetabekJabar Regional prepared traffic engineering in the form of situational contraflow, with a starting point of Km 05 + 600 to Km 13 + 000 Jagorawi Toll Road, starting at 15.00 to 21.00 WIB. "It is suggested that road users remain cautious, pay attention to the signs and directions of officers, and arrange travel time," Irra added.
